column4: I'm sure your offer would be appreciated, try posting to the ubuntu-devel list?
it's the mailing list where discussions about the developmentof Ubuntu happen
go and subscribe to it, and then just send an email to ubuntu-devel@lists.ubuntu.com
if you don't want to subscribe, mention thaty in your message so people will CC you
would you know how i can broadcast internet radio from my linux box?
I will hopefully be able to produce some better graphics for the linux community -- AND FUCK MICROSOFTS SHITTY OS OVER!!!
and  you continuted it, on and on and on
stop it.  I pointed you at the place to offer your help, and then you got into a stupid fight with someone.
just leave it, and write that email!
well, that's a shame, but good luck.
can you please stop being so abusive?
